title: Harvard logo type face
content:
Hi!!Help!! Does anyone know the name for this font???  
I'd appreciate your help!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140120085640im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_3594.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [photo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140120085640/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_1.jpg) | 148.7 KB |
author: brencarias

comments.content:
Most athletic logos come from hand lettering or pre-made fabric or vinyl letters — very few are made with digital fonts. Here are some in the same vein:

[Princetown](http://web.archive.org/web/20140120085640/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/princetown_std_plain/)  
 [Varsity](http://web.archive.org/web/20140120085640/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/5001)  
 [Yearbook](http://web.archive.org/web/20140120085640/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative_alliance/yearbook/)  
 [Superstar](http://web.archive.org/web/20140120085640/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/superstar_std_plain/)  
 [Return Pass](http://web.archive.org/web/20140120085640/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/return-pass/?refby=typographica)  
 [Player](http://web.archive.org/web/20140120085640/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/player/?refby=typographica)  
 [Octin Sports](http://web.archive.org/web/20140120085640/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/octin-sports/?refby=typographica)  
 [Octin College](http://web.archive.org/web/20140120085640/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/octin-college/?refby=typographica)  
 [United](http://web.archive.org/web/20140120085640/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=531)
Thank you so much! Much easier with those but I still had to draw a little. Thanks again
